i.name: Love Tap
i.description: Miss Fortune deals bonus physical damage whenever she attacks a new target.

q.name: Double Up
q.description: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them. Both strikes can also apply Love Tap.

w.name: Strut
w.description: Miss Fortune passively gains Movement Speed when not attacked. This ability can be activated to grant bonus Attack Speed for a short duration. While it's on cooldown, Love Taps reduce the remaining cooldown of Strut.

e.name: Make It Rain
e.description: Miss Fortune reveals an area with a flurry of bullets, dealing waves of damage to opponents and slowing them.

r.name: Bullet Time
r.description: Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies. Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike

riot.name: Love Tap
riot.description: Miss Fortune deals bonus physical damage whenever she attacks a new target.

i1.name: Love Tap
i1.blurb: Miss Fortune deals bonus physical damage whenever she attacks a new target.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Miss Fortune's''' next basic attack against an enemy unit ({{tip|turrets}} included), that was not the target of her previous basic attack, will deal {{as|{{pp|6|key=%|50 to 100|1;4;7 to 13|formula=50%+10% every 3 levels up to 7, then+10% every 2 levels up to 13}} AD}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}}, halved to {{as|{{pp|6|key=%|50/2 to 100/2|1;4;7 to 13|formula=25%+5% every 3 levels up to 7, then+5% every 2 levels up to 13}} AD}} versus [[minions]].
notes: * With {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} ''Love Tap'' only applies to the target affected by ''Miss Fortune's'' primary basic attack.

riot.name: Double Up
riot.description: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them. Both strikes can also apply Love Tap.
riot.tooltip:
Miss Fortune fires a bouncing shot through an enemy, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to each target hit. Both apply on-hit effects.

The second shot can critically strike for {{ f1 }}% damage, and it always critically strikes if the first shot kills its target.

q1.name: Double Up
q1.blurb: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them. Both strikes can also apply Love Tap.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Miss Fortune''' fires a shot at a target enemy that deals {{as|physical damage}}, which then bounces to hit another unit behind it. The shot applies [[on-hit effects]], including {{ai|Love Tap}}.
q1.description2: ''Double Up's'' bounce prioritizes units directly behind the primary target.
q1.description3: ''Double Up's'' bounce can {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|100% {{critical damage|100}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}. If ''Double Up'' kills the first target, the second hit will {{tip|critically strike}}.
notes: * {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} can be used by either target. A {{tip|spell shield}} on the primary target will not prevent the shot from bouncing.
* The second shot follows a priority order on targets within 500 units of the primary one:
*# Enemy or neutral units within a 20º cone.
*# Enemy or neutral units within a 40º cone.
*# Enemy or neutral units within a 110º cone.
*# Enemy or neutral units within {{tt|150|Estimated}} units in a 160º cone.
* ''Double Up's'' cast range adjusts based on '''Miss Fortune's''' attack range.
* ''Double Up'' can bounce to units in [[brush]] or in [[Sight|fog of war]] if they are in range of the primary target.
* The damage of a {{tip|critical strike|critically striking}} second shot is {{ap|20*2 to 100*2}} {{as|(+ 200% AD)}} {{as|(+ 70% AP)}} {{as|physical damage}}.

riot.name: Strut
riot.description: Miss Fortune passively gains Movement Speed when not attacked. This ability can be activated to grant bonus Attack Speed for a short duration. While it's on cooldown, Love Taps reduce the remaining cooldown of Strut.
riot.tooltip:
Passive: After 5 seconds of not taking direct damage, Miss Fortune gains {{ e5 }} Movement Speed. After another 5 seconds, this bonus increases to {{ e2 }}.

Active: Fully activates Strut's Movement Speed and grants {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Love Taps reduce the cooldown of Strut by {{ f2 }} seconds.

w1.name: Strut
w1.blurb: Miss Fortune passively gains Movement Speed when not attacked. This ability can be activated to grant bonus Attack Speed for a short duration. While it's on cooldown, Love Taps reduce the remaining cooldown of Strut.
w1.description: {{sbc|Passive - Strut:}} '''Miss Fortune''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|25 '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} if she has not taken damage in the last 5 seconds, excluding damage over time. This bonus is increased to a greater amount after another 5 seconds.
w1.description2: {{sbc|Active - Guns Blazing:}} '''Miss Fortune''' gains {{sti|as|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 4 seconds and brings ''Strut's'' passive effect to full power.
w1.description3: Marking a new target with {{ai|Love Tap|Miss Fortune}} reduces ''Strut's'' {{sti|cooldown}} by {{tt|2 seconds|Affected by cooldown reduction}}.

riot.name: Strut
riot.description: Miss Fortune passively gains Movement Speed when not attacked. This ability can be activated to grant bonus Attack Speed for a short duration. While it's on cooldown, Love Taps reduce the remaining cooldown of Strut.
riot.tooltip:
Passive: After 5 seconds of not taking direct damage, Miss Fortune gains {{ e5 }} Movement Speed. After another 5 seconds, this bonus increases to {{ e2 }}.

Active: Fully activates Strut's Movement Speed and grants {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Love Taps reduce the cooldown of Strut by {{ f2 }} seconds.

w2.name: Strut
w2.blurb: Miss Fortune passively gains Movement Speed when not attacked. This ability can be activated to grant bonus Attack Speed for a short duration. While it's on cooldown, Love Taps reduce the remaining cooldown of Strut.
w2.description: {{sbc|Passive - Strut:}} '''Miss Fortune''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|25 '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} if she has not taken damage in the last 5 seconds, excluding damage over time. This bonus is increased to a greater amount after another 5 seconds.
w2.description2: {{sbc|Active - Guns Blazing:}} '''Miss Fortune''' gains {{sti|as|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 4 seconds and brings ''Strut's'' passive effect to full power.
w2.description3: Marking a new target with {{ai|Love Tap|Miss Fortune}} reduces ''Strut's'' {{sti|cooldown}} by {{tt|2 seconds|Affected by cooldown reduction}}.

riot.name: Make It Rain
riot.description: Miss Fortune reveals an area with a flurry of bullets, dealing waves of damage to opponents and slowing them.
riot.tooltip: Miss Fortune reveals an area, raining down bullets that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 2 seconds and slow enemies hit by {{ e2 }}%.

e1.name: Make It Rain
e1.blurb: Miss Fortune reveals an area with a flurry of bullets, dealing waves of damage to opponents and slowing them.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Miss Fortune''' rains down hundreds of bullets onto the target area for 2 seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} and dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds to units within the area.
notes: * ''Make It Rain'' grants {{tip|sight}} of its area of effect.
* ''Make It Rain'' remains active for its duration even if ''Miss Fortune'' dies.

riot.name: Bullet Time
riot.description: Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies. Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike
riot.tooltip:
Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets for {{ channelduration }} seconds, dealing {{ damageperwave }} physical damage per wave ({{ waves }} waves total).

Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike for {{ critmultiplier }} damage.

Total Damage: {{ totaldamage }}

r1.name: Bullet Time
r1.blurb: Miss Fortune channels a flurry of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies. Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Miss Fortune''' {{tip|channels}} for 3 seconds while firing several waves of bullets in a cone, with each wave dealing {{as|75% AD}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|physical damage}}.
r1.leveling: {{st|Total Waves|{{ap|12 to 16 3}}|Minimum Total Damage|{{as|{{ap|75*12 to 75*16 3}}% AD}} {{as|(+ {{ap|20*12 to 20*16 3}}% AP)}}}}
r1.description2: Each wave can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}}, dealing {{as|20% {{critical damage|20}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}.
notes: * ''Bullet Time'' fires a wave of bullets each {{ap|3/12 to 3/16 3}} seconds.
